<h3 id="X31439">X(31439) = CENTROID OF CURVATURES OF THESE CIRCLES: {BEVAN, 2nd LEMOINE, STAMMLER}</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a*(2*a^3+(b+c)*a^2-4*S*a-2*(b^2+b*c+c^2)*a-(b^2-c^2)*(b-c))  :  :

<br>
<b>X(31439) = 3*X(371)-X(7969)</b>
<p>X(31439) lies on these lines:
